summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Mercer Street from First Avenue North to Warren Avenue, and from Second Avenue North to Fifth Avenue North; Republican Street, from Queen Anne Avenue to Fifth Avenue North; First Avenue North, from Mercer Street to Republican Street; Third Avenue North, from Aloha Street to Harrison Street; Nob Hill Avenue from Aloha Street to Harrison Street, and Fourth Avenue North, from Prospect Street to Harrison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks in accordance with Resolution No. 89 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
